meta.description: Calculate the maximum amount of electricity that can be transmitted from Station 0 (source) to Station 7 (destination) in a network of 8 stations with given transmission line capacities.

sets.name: STATIONS
sets.description: Set of power stations in the network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of transmission lines between stations in megawatts.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of electricity between stations in megawatts.

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow of electricity from source to destination in megawatts.

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total flow of electricity from Station 0 to Station 7.

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source station (Station 0).

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink station (Station 7).

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate station 1.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate station 2.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate station 3.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_4
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate station 4.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_5
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate station 5.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_6
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate station 6.
